Title: Analyst / Consultant Organisational and Digital Transformation (ODT), supply chain - Bioindustry
RoleDescription:
We are looking for an ambitious and enthusiastic Analyst / Consultant. In this position, you will have a unique opportunity to provide your contribution towards a sustainable future by passionately driving the necessary change processes in the pulp and paper and adjacent industries in our Bioindustry ODT team. Your responsibilitiesAs a member of a highly motivated international team of consultants with focus on Operational Excellence Projects you will diagnose, redesign, and implement operational excellence initiatives within the pulp and paper and adjacent industries, with special focus on supply chain.You will develop and conduct client workshops to identify opportunities to enhance efficiency across production, supply chain, and maintenance, reduce process breaks, eliminate unnecessary interfaces, and create innovative solutions.In close collaboration with our clients you will formulate core transformation strategies based on client data and employee insights.Together with your colleagues you will identify opportunities to enhance efficiency across production, supply chain, and maintenance, reduce process breaks, eliminate unnecessary interfaces, and create innovative solutions.We undertake a lot of complex process models, so we are looking for someone with an aptitude for IT and digital solutionsOne of our main tasks is change management, which is why another focus of your work will be to identify change management needs and work closely with clients and their employees to support organizational transformation.Your profileYou have a very good university degree in business, economics, paper technology, or engineering.You gained first experience in the pulp and paper or related industries by work or internshipsYou are highly interested / experienced in designing target operating models, organizational design, and process design from a consulting perspective.We undertake a lot of complex analyses, so we expect you to have an analytical and quantitative mindset as well as a strong affinity to IT and digital solutionsFull fluency in German and English (oral and written) is essential. As we work a lot across national borders, additional language skills are a plus.You have the willingness to travel to customer sites.We believe that we are at our best, when colleagues with different backgrounds and assets work together, so it s essential to have a high level of enthusiasm for constantly changing challenges and enjoy working well and effectively with others.Our offerIn AFRY Management Consulting we are proud to have a respectful, collaborative, supportive, trustful, and responsible way of working with a strong desire to achieve the highest level of quality for our customers.
We work in a global environment with a clear focus on the needs of our local clients. We are a modern employer strongly driven by our values based on long-term sustainability.From day one, you are involved in a project team. You will work on varying and stimulating projects with the world's leading companies in the pulp and paper industry and collaborate with engaged and highly qualified colleagues across national borders. You will be empowered through flatter hierarchies and encouraged  to take responsibilities - for your personal and professional growth.In AFRY Management Consulting we believe that we are at our best, when colleagues with different backgrounds and assets work together  and getting better every day. Based on the learning on-the job-principle you will learn and develop through qualified consulting trainings, support by an experienced mentor and accompaniment by a buddy for excellent career opportunities.
We offer competitive performance-orientated compensation, corporate benefits and highly flexible working conditions. Working with us in AFRY Management is demanding, but you will find the necessary freedom to develop and learn, and to facilitate reconciliation between professional and private life.We have a high level of enthusiasm for what we do and would expect the same of you. If you would like to be part of the transformation of the sector we are looking forward to receiving your application in English language,including a motivation letter and latest transcripts. For further information please visit our website

When we collaborate, innovate technology, and embrace challenging points of view. Thats how we're making future.
